sentences.en: Every Saturday dad made a beautiful pea and ham soup.
sentences.cn: 每个星期六爸爸都做美味的豌豆火腿汤。

sentences.en: He got born like the cotton in the boll or the rabbit in the pea patch.
sentences.cn: 他就象棉桃里的棉花,象豌豆地里的野兔子一样生下来了.

sentences.en: He started tipping the pea pods into a pan.
sentences.cn: 他开始把豌豆荚倒进锅中.

sentences.en: I would challenge any doubting Thomas in my pea patch.
sentences.cn: 有谁不信,我愿在我的豌豆畦里与他辩论一番.

sentences.en: My pea jacket has greened with wear.
sentences.cn: 我那件厚呢上衣已经穿得变成绿色了.

sentences.en: Pea pods burst open when overripe.
Polyurethane elastomers based on glycols ( PEA, PPG PTMG ) , diisocyanate ( TDI ) and chain extender ( E - 300 ) were prepared.
sentences.cn: 以多元醇 ( PEA, PPG,PTMG ),PDI, E300为原料,制备了 PU 弹性体.

sentences.en: roast chicken with peas and carrots
The function optimization and knapsack problem show the effectiveness of PEA.
sentences.cn: 函数优化和背包问题实验验证了PEA的 有效性.

sentences.en: The headmaster confiscated Tommy's pea - shooter.
sentences.cn: 校长没收了汤米的射豆枪.

sentences.en: The moon would be a speck the size of a small pea.
sentences.cn: 月亮是豆子般的一颗小粒.

sentences.en: The processing technology of spicy crisp pigeon pea was studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了香酥木豆的加工工艺.

sentences.en: The waiter leaves, but the man changes his mind to pea soup.
sentences.cn: 服务员走了, 但是这个男人改变了主意,他想换成豌豆汤.

sentences.en: W : Green pea soup, sir. Croutons are already in the soup.
sentences.cn: 青碗豆汤, 先生, 汤内已有面包碎片了.

sentences.en: We have a bowl of very salty pea and ham soup.
sentences.cn: 我们喝了一碗非常咸的豌豆火腿汤.

sentences.en: We have chicken, sweet pea stalks , and fish with bean sauce.
sentences.cn: 我们有鸡, 好吃的豌豆, 还有鱼和豆汁.

phrases.phrase: like peas (或 two peas) in a pod

phrases.tran_cn: n. [植]香豌豆；[植]麝香豌豆花

trans.tran_cn: 豌豆，豌豆类，豌豆状物，〈美俚〉棒球
trans.tran_en: a round green seed that is cooked and eaten as a vegetable, or the plant on which these seeds grow
